
## Class : epithelium of oropharynx

## Other Annotations

 * *[definition](../../IAO/15/IAO_0000115.md)* = An epithelium that is part of a oropharynx [Automatically generated definition].
 * *[external_ontology_notes](../../UBPROP/12/UBPROP_0000012.md)* = Composition varies with species and time. This is classified as nonkeratinizing stratified squamous in FMA, unilaminar in EHDAA2; the majority of the pharyngeal epithelium is unilaminar in zebrafish
